00036 namespace pwiz {
00037 namespace msdata {

00040 /// binary-to-text encoding
00041 class PWIZ_API_DECL BinaryDataEncoder
00042 {
00043     public:
00044 
00045     enum Precision {Precision_32, Precision_64};
00046     enum ByteOrder {ByteOrder_LittleEndian, ByteOrder_BigEndian};
00047     enum Compression {Compression_None, Compression_Zlib};
00048 
00049     /// encoding/decoding configuration 
00050     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00051     {
00052         Precision precision;
00053         ByteOrder byteOrder;
00054         Compression compression;
00055 
00056         std::map<CVID, Precision> precisionOverrides;
00057 
00058         Config()
00059         :   precision(Precision_64),
00060             byteOrder(ByteOrder_LittleEndian),
00061             compression(Compression_None)
00062         {}
00063     };
00064 
00065     BinaryDataEncoder(const Config& config = Config());
00066 
00067     /// encode binary data as a text string
00068     void encode(const std::vector<double>& data, std::string& result) const;
00069 
00070     /// encode binary data as a text string
00071     void encode(const double* data, size_t dataSize, std::string& result) const;
00072 
00073     /// decode text-encoded data as binary 
00074     void decode(const std::string& encodedData, std::vector<double>& result) const;
00075 
00076     private:
00077     class Impl;
00078     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00079     BinaryDataEncoder(const BinaryDataEncoder&);
00080     BinaryDataEncoder& operator=(const BinaryDataEncoder&);
00081 };

00087 } // namespace msdata
